mustSee.short: Storm timing could affect evening fireworks.
mustSee.long: A moving weather window may delay or cancel select nighttime spectaculars. Recheck the app after 6:00 PM.

hotTiles.short: Festival performances start early at EPCOT.
hotTiles.long: Festival stage schedules shifted 30 minutes earlier this morning.
Cast members confirmed new stock in MK and DHS shops before noon.

topStories.short: TRON opening rush is peaking before lunch.
topStories.long: Use standby later in the day when posted waits historically settle by 2 PM.

topStories.short: Figment festival merch moved to mobile checkout lane.
topStories.long: The highest-demand items are now routed through a separate register line.

topStories.short: Indiana Jones first show started at full capacity.
topStories.long: Early arrival is recommended for center-section seating this morning.

topStories.short: Satu'li Canteen mobile order windows reopened.
topStories.long: Breakfast mobile ordering resumed after a short POS outage.

topStories.short: Bus routes adjusted for race weekend road closures.
topStories.long: Temporary reroutes are active for select resort loops through midday.

parksSummary.headline: TRON and Space Mountain both trending high.
Festival crowds concentrated in World Showcase.
Galaxy's Edge wait times climbing steadily.
Animal Kingdom remains the lightest crowd option.

resortsBlurb.short: Monorail transfer times are running 10-15 minutes longer.
resortsBlurb.long: Expect additional platform hold at TTC due to intermittent train spacing.

resortsBlurb.short: Polynesian quick service reopened after morning delay.
resortsBlurb.long: Captain Cook's has resumed normal ordering and walk-up availability.

MK.todayVibe: High-energy morning with major coaster demand.

mustSee.short: Mickey's Philharmagic operating with reduced capacity.
mustSee.long: One theater bank is temporarily offline, increasing turnover times.

hot.short: Festival of Fantasy route adjusted near Frontierland.
hot.long: Viewing zones shifted slightly due to parade operations support.

hot.short: Castle popcorn bucket available at two carts.
hot.long: Stock remains limited and may sell out before late afternoon.

headlines.short: Country Bears queue moved to overflow lane.
headlines.long: Entry cast members are routing guests to side access for faster loading.

resortBlurbs.short: Contemporary walkway security line extended by 5 minutes.
resortBlurbs.long: Bag checks are moving steadily but with minor backup at rope drop.

EPCOT.todayVibe: Festival-heavy foot traffic with concentrated peaks.

headlines.short: Festival stage lineup shifted due to weather hold.
headlines.long: First performance resumed with adjusted times posted near America Gardens.

DHS.todayVibe: Steady build toward afternoon demand in Galaxy's Edge.

headlines.short: Rise of the Resistance hit a 95-minute peak.
headlines.long: Single rider alternatives are limited; Genie+ windows moved quickly.

AK.todayVibe: Most balanced park this morning with easier standby flow.

headlines.short: Harambe Market opened all windows early.
headlines.long: Mobile order slots remained open through late breakfast period.
